verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> them,

And <S%H559>say,<s%> You <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> to the <S%H650>rivers,<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I, even I, will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> on you, and I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> your <S%H1116>high<s%> places.

And your <S%H4196>altars<s%> shall be <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> and your <S%H2553>images<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken:<s%> and I will <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> your <S%H2491>slain<s%> men <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> the dead <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H1544>idols;<s%> and I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> your <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about your <S%H4196>altars.<s%>

In <S%H3605>all<s%> your dwelling <S%H4186>places<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be laid <S%H2717>waste,<s%> and the <S%H1116>high<s%> places shall be <S%H3456>desolate;<s%> that your <S%H4196>altars<s%> may be laid <S%H2717>waste<s%> and made <S%H816>desolate,<s%> and your <S%H1544>idols<s%> may be <S%H7665>broken<s%> and <S%H7673>cease,<s%> and your <S%H2553>images<s%> may be <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>down,<s%> and your <S%H4639>works<s%> may be <S%H4229>abolished.<s%>
And the <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you, and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Yet will I <S%H3498>leave<s%> a <S%H3498>remnant,<s%> that you may <S%H1961>have<s%> some that shall <S%H6412>escape<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> when you shall be <S%H2219>scattered<s%> through the <S%H776>countries.<s%>

And they that <S%H6412>escape<s%> of you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> me among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they shall be <S%H7617>carried<s%> <S%H7617>captives,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> I am <S%H7665>broken<s%> with their <S%H2181>whorish<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H5493>departed<s%> from me, and with their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> which <S%H3318>go<s%> a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols:<s%> and they shall <S%H6962>loathe<s%> <S%H6440>themselves<s%> for the <S%H7451>evils<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>
And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and that I have not <S%H1696>said<s%> in <S%H2600>vain<s%> that I would <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to them.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H5221>Smite<s%> with your <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and <S%H7554>stamp<s%> with your <S%H7272>foot,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H253>Alas<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> for they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

He that is <S%H7350>far<s%> off shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> and he that is <S%H7138>near<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and he that <S%H7604>remains<s%> and is <S%H5341>besieged<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine:<s%> thus will I <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> on them.

Then shall you <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when their <S%H2491>slain<s%> men shall be <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H424>oak,<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they did <S%H5414>offer<s%> <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

So will I <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on them, and <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> yes, more <S%H8047>desolate<s%> than the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> toward <S%H1689>Diblath,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4186>habitations:<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
